title: Did a BJP leader in Bihar attack the District Collector? Here’s the truth behind this video | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A video is being shared on social media with a claim that a BJP leader in Bihar recently attacked the District Collector there.

“Bihar BJP MLA Attack Dist Collector 🙈

 Shame on This Goons Of BJP” the caption read.

NewsMobile fact-checked the post and found it to be misleading.

We ran a search using keywords ‘BJP MLA Attack District Collector’ and found a report by ZEE News dated January 17, 2018, featuring the same video.

According to the report, the incident is from Jharkhand, where BJP leader Rajdhani Yadav, argued and attacked the District Transport Officer (DTO) of Latehar, F Barla, for removing a nameplate from his vehicle that bore his designation and name.

The video was tweeted by newswire ANI.

The above information proves that the claim attached to the video is misleading and false.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
